org.ingatan.component.librarymanager
Class LibraryBrowser

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.ingatan.component.librarymanager.LibraryBrowser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class LibraryBrowser
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Used in the library manager, this component encapsulates the loaded group and library files, as well as providing an interface by which the user may navigate through groups and select libraries.

The component also provides incorporates buttons for editing the group, adding a new library, deleting a library, editing a library and importing/exporting a group/library.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Thomas Everingham
See Also:
Serialized Form

btnAddLib

protected javax.swing.JButton btnAddLib
Button used to create a new library.

btnRemoveLib

protected javax.swing.JButton btnRemoveLib
Button used to delete a library and all questions within it. The user will be presented with three options:
  • Remove this library from the current group, but do not delete it (if group != 'all')
  • Delete this library and all questions within it.
  • Delete this library and move all questions to [other library]

btnEditLib

protected javax.swing.JButton btnEditLib
Button used to access library editor.

btnExport

protected javax.swing.JButton btnExport
Button used to acces the library/group importer/exporter.

A nicer component font (smaller) based on the default font.

getSelectedLibraryIndex

public int getSelectedLibraryIndex()
Gets the index of the currently selected library.

Returns:
the index of the currently selected library, or -1 if no library is selected.

public void updateLibraries()
Update the libraries field with values from the library manager, based on the current selection in the groups combo list.

Gets the selected group name.

Returns:
the selected group name. null if the 'all libraries' group is selected.

getSelectedLibraryID

public java.lang.String getSelectedLibraryID()
Gets the library ID corresponding to the selected library.

Returns:
the library ID corresponding to the selected library, or null if no library is selected.

notifyOfLibraryDeletion

public void notifyOfLibraryDeletion()
Called by the LibraryManagerWindow so that the library browser is aware that a library was deleted. The deleted library has to have been the selected library, and so this method sets the selectedLibraryID field to null so that no attempt is made to save it when a new library is selected.

getLibraryIDFromIndex

public java.lang.String getLibraryIDFromIndex(int index)
Gets the libraryID for the entry at the given index of the libraries list.

Parameters:
index - the index of the entry to get the ID for
Returns:
the ID of the library entry at the given index.
